reviewText: The whole premise of this game is to be the baker you've always dreamed to be.  Create and bake a cake accurately and quickly to achieve the most points to move on to the next stage of your baking career.\n\nI have played this game since the beginning and it is very addicting to continue even after completing the game.  I believe there is a small learning curve but once you are used to the controls and the different variations of creating the cake off you go to help the baker's grandmother to save her bakery.

reviewText: The first one worked for a little bit, then decided not to run anymore. Second and third don't work either. Waste of money.

CM 1 works fine, CM 2 and CM 3 both dont launch with a fatal error coming up even after reinstalling, in my opinion not worth the money when 2 out of the 3 games dont work

These games are a satisfying way to kill a few hours if you enjoy the time management/strategy genre.\n\nThe games are very similar to each other, but each sequel adds more features. The third installment includes minigames and a greater variety. There is a far superior sequel on steam Cake Mania: Main Street" which will probably give you more playtime than this whole bundle
recommended: if you want to play them all
hoursPlayed: start with the earlier ones to get the most enjoyment out of them.\n\nNB If you are unable to run any of the games
voteText: ensure that you are running them in compatability mode. See this post for how to do that."
